creator: jonathan.gibbons@sun.com
text:
Hi, I'm the JDK engineer at Sun responsible for javac.

On the page regarding the <javac> task, there are a couple of places where the name if the -Xbootclasspath is incorrectly given as -Xbootstrap.

Visit this page:
http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/javac.html

and search for "Xbootstrap".   There should be two occurrences.   Both of them should read -Xbootclasspath instead.

creator: jglick@apache.org
text:
One I had already fixed a few months ago in svn rev 790005. The other I will fix now in svn rev 832539.

https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/ant/core/trunk/docs/manual/CoreTasks/javac.html
